name: Quoter
0:
”Alexa, ask Quote Engine to quote Einstein”
”Alexa, ask Quote Engine to say a quote”
”Alexa, ask Quote Engine to give me a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quote engine
des: A novelty app to lookup and relay a quote. It utilizes the https://forismatic.com/en/ API and has some rudimentary logic to find a quote by author.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
